verify_account_body: Thanks for starting the new Raiz account creation process. We want to make sure it's really you. Please enter the following verification code when prompted. If you don't want to create an account, you can ignore this message.
verify_account_security_note: Raiz will never email you and ask you to disclose or verify your password.
forgot_password_body: We received a request to reset the password for your Raiz account. Please visit the link below to set a new password. If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.
